Package org.red5.net.websocket.server

Class DefaultServerEndpointConfigurator

java.lang.Object
jakarta.websocket.server.ServerEndpointConfig.Configurator
org.red5.net.websocket.server.DefaultServerEndpointConfigurator
public class DefaultServerEndpointConfigurator extends jakarta.websocket.server.ServerEndpointConfig.Configurator
Red5 implementation of the WebSocket JSR365 ServerEndpointConfig.Configurator.
Author:
Paul Gregoire
